Title: Implementing Content Security Policy (CSP) in ASP.NET Core
Description: This post is about implementing content security policy in ASP.NET Core. Content Security Policy (CSP) is an added layer of security that helps to detect and mitigate certain types of attacks, including Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and data injection attacks. These attacks are used for everything from data theft to site defacement or distribution of malware - Content Security Policy (CSP) MDN

Title: A truly Open Source MongoDB alternative
Description: MongoDB is a life-changing technology for many Developers, empowering them to build applications faster than using relational databases. However, MongoDB abandoned its Open Source roots, changing the license to SSPL making it unusable for many Open Source and Commercial Projects. MangoDB is going to be a perfect solution for those looking for MongoDB development experience available as fully Open Source Software.
